quote: Home is where the heart is, home is where the fart is.Come let us fart in the home.There is no art in a fart.Still a fart may not be artless.Let us fart and artless fart in the home.
quote_letters: HOME IS WHERE THE HEART IS HOME IS WHERE THE FART ISCOME LET US FART IN THE HOMETHERE IS NO ART IN A FARTSTILL A FART MAY NOT BE ARTLESSLET US FART AND ARTLESS FART IN THE HOME
